attributes.action: pass a law requiring that parent and child parking spaces be no closer than 250 metres from the nearest shop entrance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The rationale for parent+child spaces is that doors must be opened wide to safely get children into and out of cars.
This can be done without being close to the shop entrance, and the extra exercise in walking across might help fight obesity.
The added advantage is that other drivers won't want to use these spaces and parents will stop whining about the spaces being misused.
